timeline.bodyText:
Some of them have quickstart in it but not all of them? Should we make everything consistent? @rsvoboda WDYT?
BTW, we will need to upgrade the guides too.
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
+1 to have it consistent
I asked @Rutzzzz to prepare list of proposed package names.
He should paste the list here so we can agree on it before he starts adjusting the code.
replies.author: rsvoboda
